title: Laugfs Gas increases prices; 12.5kg cylinder costs over Rs. 4,000
body_lines: Laugfs Gas PLC, one of the main liquefied petroleum gas suppliers in Sri Lanka, announced a hike in the rates of its products today (March 20).
Thereby, the price of a 12.5kg domestic LP gas cylinder has soared to Rs. 4,199.
Meanwhile, the price of 5kg cylinder has been increased to Rs. 1,680 while the price of 2kg cylinder rose to Rs. 672.
